p: Over 65% of watercressâ€™ EO was constituted of isothiocyanates, among which benzyl isothiocyanate was the only detected compound of this chemical class. Benzylnitrile followed as the second most abundant compound in the EO, accounting for up to 26.0%. Phytol, the sole oxygenated diterpene detected in this EO, showed a relative concentration of 3.3%.
